channel.title: Forums/website help
channel.description:
Idk if this is the right section or not, but i really need some help.
I was wondering what forums and website should i use and what website can i get it from? i don't really want crappy forums like .smfforfree and stuff like that. I have money if needed btw. Also, i don't really know where to get a domain like .net, .com. things like that. Please comment below if you need more info on my problem! (if you don't get what im trying to ask)

www.homestead.com they have site builder everything works good for hosting server to like vps u can ue there ip! for 5.00 month n make “domain” 24/7 help on there sites n they know what there talking about!
